channel.title: Is a Portal Gun a possibility?
channel.description:
Hi guys, i was wondering if one of you modding wizards would be able to bring one of them cool portal guns into the world. It would really help getting around your factories especially when it comes to verticality. Of course extra kudo's if it would only work on white surfaces.
I really don't even know if it would be possible at all but it would really make my day.
Cheers!

item.title: Is a Portal Gun a possibility?
item.dc:creator: @Mattias_Westrin StromE
item.description:
@Mattias_Westrin wrote:

I would love this crossover mod.

Read full topic
item.source: Is a Portal Gun a possibility?
